FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: The only sound was the gentle clicking of the Faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the Scryb were very funny anymore.
The only sound was the gentle clicking of the Faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the Scryb were very funny anymore.

Das einzige Geräusch war das sanfte Flügelschlagen der Feenwesen. Dann aber wanden sich die überlebenden Eindringlinge ab und flohen. Eines war sicher. Sie dachten nicht mehr, daß das Scryb-Volk niedlich sei.
